item.title: NFL star grabs all the attention
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> New York Giants wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. makes a spectacular one-handed touchdown grab Sunday, November 23, in East Rutherford, New Jersey. The highlight gave the Giants an early first-half lead against Dallas, but their NFC East rivals came back to win 31-28. Loading weather data ...
